page.title: Physiology Overview
page.introduction:
The Physiology contains the description of the biological components that comprise a BioModel:
Graphical Reactions Editor. Reactions and species can be added and edited here.
Reactions and Rules Editor. Both reactions and reaction rules can be specified and edited here.
Structures (Compartments) are made up of membrane and volume structures.
Species are defined across multiple compartments (except for Rule-Based models, where a single compartment is enforced temporarily)
Molecules that define building blocks for rule-based models
Observables that define outputs for rule-based models
Properties for structures can be found in the object properties pane in the bottom pane.
